item.description:
We all want to know the secret and we all have heard that it is magical. We call is Majestic! Lets sit and watch the movie and then talk about it and how it can change our lives. How do we use the power behind the Secret??? This discussion group will go further that just the basic teaching from the movie. We will take it to the next step. Presented by Barb Tremlett.

 

  •  
  • Barb Tremlett

    It is almost time to get together! Please come, watch the movie and enjoy some very clear thinking about how to change you life!! Every thing you are doing was built on a belief. Not every belief is true or serves your greater purpose. How do you stop in your tracks and make changes????? Let's talk about that after the movie!!!

    Posted September 7, 2011 at 2:45 PM | Like | Delete

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Postive Thinkers League- The Secret Movie and Discussion!
